text: Magda al-Sabahi (; 6 May 1931 – 16 January 2020) or Magda, was an Egyptian movie actress. She was known for her roles from 1949 to 1994.ماجدة الصباحي: رحيل الفنانة المصرية صاحبة أفلام "جميلة" و"العمر لحظة" و"النداهة" She was born in Tanta, Egypt. Her best known role was Jamila in Djamila l'Algérienne (1958). al-Sabahi died on 16 January 2020 in Cairo at the age of 88.الفنانة ماجدة الصباحي تستعيد ذكريات الأيام الخوالي: عبد الناصر لم يغضب مني أبداً.. هذه شائعة ==Movies== * El Naseh (1949) * Ayna Omry (1957) * Djamila l'Algérienne (1958) * Hegret El Rasoul (1964) * EL Omr Lahza (1978) ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Egyptian actors
title: Magda al-Sabahi
